Treasure

{{ rolledTreasure | json }}
~
 import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { TreasureRollResult } from '@treasure/enter-treasure/model/treasure-list-entry.model'; import { RollTreasureControllerService } from '@treasure/enter-treasure/services/roll-treasure-controller/roll-treasure-controller.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ selector: 'greg-roll-treasure', templateUrl: './roll-treasure.component.html', styleUrls: ['./roll-treasure.component.scss'], }) export class RollTreasureComponent implements OnInit { rolledTreasure$: Observable; constructor(private controllerService: RollTreasureControllerService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.rolledTreasure$ = this.controllerService.rolledTreasure$; } }
